instruction: Narrate the following story in 50 words or less.
input: Once upon a time there was a small mouse who lived in an old castle with an evil wizard.
output: Once upon a time, a small mouse lived in a castle owned by an evil wizard. The mouse had to be brave, trying to stay out of the wizard's sight and yet still gathering enough food to survive. One day, after a dangerous encounter, the mouse stumbled upon a secret room, full of treasures and magical items, and made its escape.
